title: How autonomous drones and AI are reshaping utility inspection programs
description: A recent Factor This and DTECH webinar showed how AEP Ohio is pairing autonomous drones with computer vision to spot defects earlier and speed inspection workflows.
content: A recent Factor This and DTECH webinar showed how AEP Ohio is pairing autonomous drones with computer vision to spot defects earlier and speed inspection workflows.
